Controls

Select items: drag selection window over desired items, or hold down 'shift' and left-click on an item to toggle its selection status.
(selected items are highlighted red)

Draw vertex: press down 'v' while cursor is in canvas.

Draw edge: press down 'e' while exactly two vertices are selected.

Change edge direction: press down 'd' while exaclly one (non-loop) edge is selected.
Toggles between: v1 -> v2, v2 -> v1, undirected.

Draw loop: press down 'e' while exactly one vertex is selected.

Delete items: press down 'delete' or 'backspace' to delete selected items.

Change vertex color: press down 1-6 keys while one or more vertices is selected. Each key corresponds to a different color.

Display Laplacian matrix: left-click the 'Laplacian Matrix:' button below the canvas. Graph must contain no directed edges.

A Graph Theorist's Sketchpad
